book.title: Ernest Hemingway: A Life Story
book.notable_feature: Often seen as the definitive Hemingway biography.

book.title: Hemingway's Genders: Rereading the Hemingway Text
book.notable_feature: Attempts to dispel the notion that Hemingway's works were abjectly heterosexual and masculine and without any nuance in terms of sexuality.

book.title: Hemingway
book.notable_feature: Reveals the troubled life of a man previously portrayed as stolidness.
